sections.Situation: Jiro Kuroki from Iwaki, Fukushima Prefecture, calls Kogoro to help his artist teacher, Shizusan Hayakawa to relief depression since the old man is unable to draw anymore of his age. During a fishing trip, Hayakawa's maid finds that the old man had hanged himself on the bamboo tree. Did the old man commit suicide or was it a murder?
